text: bulsinjadeul-iyeo neohuiga seunglileulguhayeoss-euna imi choehuui pandan-i neohuiege ileuleoss-euni neohuiga geulus doem-eul dannyeomhal ttae neohuiege bog-i doe lila neohuiga dasi gong-gyeog-eul handamyeon hananim-i gyesinila geulihamae neohui ui gundaega jung-gahanda hadeolado geu gundaeneun neohuiege muyonghalini sillo hananim-eun midneunjadeulgwa hamkke hasigi ttaemun-ila
